column4: Can someone look at this pastebin and tell me whats going on. i never encountered this problem before and im alil lost! http://pastebin.com/m158cc925
did you disconnect / move a disk ?

well earlier yesterday my windows drive needed formated then after formatting grub messed up so i had to throw in a live cd and rescue it now when i try to boot into either of them i get nothin! Note: I have to sata drives one for linux other for windows
The uuid of the drive has probably changed for some reason. I think there's a page on the Ubuntu wiki about resetting it.
